title: A1534 820-00045-A no power
message:
Hi,

I have an A1534 820-00045-A that has no power.
With one side of the charger conected, the ampmeter stays full black. If I switch the side of the power cable, the ampmeter just blinks.

On F4700, when the ampmeter blinks, I only get 2.5-7 V
F4700 diode value is ok (0.554)

E85_CC1/2 diode values seams to be ok (0.547).

CHGR_LDO_VDDA/P diode values also seams ok (0.445)

Should I replace U4700?

title: A1534 820-00045-A no power
message:
Start with U4700 and continue with U4780, if needed.
3V0_AON diode mode to ground?

title: A1534 820-00045-A no power
message:
You're right.

 3V0_AON  was shorted and after replacing U4700 it powered on gain. 

TKS!
